yāvatatiyañ'ce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, icc'etaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, saṅghādiseso.

meaning_lit: offence requiring involvement of the community from start to finish

sentence: yāvatatiyañ'ce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, icc'etaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyyuṃ, saṅghādiseso.
pali_1: (if) being admonished up to three times, they should relinquish that (legal issue), that is good, (but) if they should not relinquish (it), is a saṅghādisesa (offence).
